text: Hans Petersson (24 September 1902 in Bentschen - 9 November 1984 in Münster) was a German mathematician. He introduced the Petersson inner product and is also known for the Ramanujan–Petersson conjecture. Petersson was a Nazi.Mathematik in der Heidelberger Akademie der Wissenschaften by Gabriele Dörflinger ==See also== *Weil–Petersson metric ==References== * * Category:1902 births Category:1984 deaths Category:People from Zbąszyń Category:20th-century German mathematicians Category:People from the Province of Posen Category:Charles University faculty Category:Nazi Party members Category:University of Münster faculty Category:20th-century mathematicians
title: Hans Petersson
